Hey Colin,

Thanks for your reply. Indeed, I've plugged in a very simple
ex=
periment, and I'm looking at restructuring possibilities as well -
mainly:
=

- Separating each experimenting onto its own library
- Initializing said l=
ibraries on the fly, not all at once (this would
probably save some memory)=

- Creating a text "dictionary" of possible experiments, so that the
new ex=
periments can be plugged in without having to recompile the main
program

I=
'm still a bit fuzzy on what some of the experiment parameters mean,
so I t=
hought that this would help in understanding the overall library
structure.=


I'll see you on the developers list.


-- R.
